More Frequently Asked Questions:

  • Am I allowed to purchase 2 or more designs for the same price as 1? for example if I order 50 of one design and 50 of another can I buy them for the same price as an order for 100 buttons?

    Sorry, you are not able to combine 2 different designs and be able to order it for the price of just 1. To calculate the price for a split order of multiple designs please use our button order calculator.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • What button sizes do you offer?

    We offer 1 inch, 1.5 inch, 2.25 inch, and 3 inch buttons

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you charge more for color than black and white designs?

    Black and White designs are the same price as color. We do not charge extra for multiple colors. Price quotes can be found at www.wackybuttons.com/prices.php

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do I have to purchase a minimum 25 buttons? Can I order just 1 button?

    You can order just 1 button if you want. We have no limit or restriction on quantity so you can order any quantity.

    We also recommend buying just 1 button as a sample if you are planning to order a large quantity of buttons. This way you are absolutely sure your large order of buttons will turn out the way you want.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you sell button parts or button machines?

    For a full line of button machines, supplies, and other button products please visit our partner site: www.umakebuttons.com.


    [CLOSE THIS]

  • I forgot my Design Code. Can you tell me it again?

    You can visit the following page to view your designs: http://www.wackybuttons.com/order.php. There is a form on the bottom right of that page that says "View All My Button Designs" where you can enter your email address and lookup all your designs. If you are unable to find your deigns using that site, email order@wackybuttons.com and say you forgot your Design Code and include your name and email address

    [CLOSE THIS]

    We offer several shipping options so that you can meet your deadline and work within your budget. Here is a list of services we offer and estimated delivery times.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • I put in a design request(s) days ago and have not yet received a response.

    If you have not received a response from us within 1 business day of either submitting a form on our site or sending a design request by email please check this page to see if your button designs have been setup: http://www.wackybuttons.com/order.php. There is a form on the bottom right of that page that says "View All My Button Designs" where you can enter your email address and lookup all your designs. If you wrote an email to us, and have not received a response, chances are you have our email address, order@wackybuttons.com, blocked or on your spam list. We are not responsible for email that bounces back to us. If you have not yet received a response, you should either call or email us through an alternate email address of yours.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • I forgot my coupon code can you tell me again what it is?

    Email order@wackybuttons.com and include your name, email address, and any Design Code of yours we have on file if you remember it. A valid email address you have used to communicate with us is good enough though.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you ship to other countries?

    Yes we ship to other countries. The list of countries we currently ship to can be found here.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Can I send you copyrighted material to be made into a button?

    Yes you can send us copyrighted or protected material to be made into custom buttons. We leave it up to the customer's discretion to submit government protected material. We must assume that any protected material we receive is property belonging to whomever submits it. Also we assume that the customer submitting any protected material has the proper rights to give us permission to print and sell their protected material strictly to them or anyone they specify.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Can I write on the button with a permanent marker or a Sharpie?

    Yes. Our buttons have a plastic cover that you can write on with a Sharpie or other permanent marker. Also dry erase markers work too if you want to make changes.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you sell buttons that light up or blinking buttons that with LCD or LED lights that blink?

    Sorry, we do not currently sell buttons that light up or have buttons with blinking lights.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you sell buttons that glow in the dark?

    Sorry, we do not currently sell glow in the dark buttons.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you sell buttons printed with neon, fluorescent, or metallic ink?

    Sorry, we do not currently sell buttons printed with neon, fluorescent, or metallic ink.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • How do you print and what are your printing capabilities?

    We print using high quality Epson Photo Inkjet Printers (Digital CMYK). We actually use a 6 color ink system (6C Dark/Light) for more accurate color. The paper we use is a special ordered thin custom bright white paper with a matte finish specifically designed for superior color quality and brightness for inkjet printing. We do not print digital laser or offest. Most professional photographers and printing companies agree that our printing process is better for printing buttons rather than laser or offset. This is because our printing method avoids double refraction which you get from combining 2 glossy finishes on top of each other. Combining glossy inks or paper and the clear plastic cover of the button can create this illusion. A button product with double refraction does not look bad, but when compared to our product side by side the glossy button will look a little weird like it has oil is underneath the cover. Our flat matte finish offers a more crystal clear image on the button itself.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Do you Pantone match or use PMS colors?

    We print CMYK using Epson inkjet printers. We are only able to closely match to the pantone system. We cannot achieve an exact match because we do not print pantone. We print on matte coated paper and can closely match to pantone matte and pantone coated colors. We will need to know prior to printing your buttons that you want a pantone match. If you do not tell us ahead of time we may not know that you are expecting your colors to match the pantone system.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Can I ship to a different address other than my billing address?

    Yes. When you are paying for your buttons online on our website you will enter your shipping address first, and choose your shipping method. Then you will be directed to a secure website where you can enter your credit card and billing address information. On the very next page, after submitting your credit card information, you will see a confirmation page showing where your package will ship to. You also have the opportunity to change the shipping address on that page if it is not correct. Here is a screen shot of what the confirmation page will look like:



    If for some reason you miss any of this, just send us an email telling us the corrections to your order.

    [CLOSE THIS]

  • Can I drop ship or blind ship an order?

    Yes. We can ship a package to someone and make it look it came from someone else. We can also be sure to not include a receipt or any indication the package came from us. To set your order up one of these ways, After your artwork is finished and you are ready to pay for your buttons, there are 2 areas to pay attention to when paying for your buttons online. After you get to the point where you enter credit card and billing information, on the very next page you will have the option to leave a note. In the note field indicate that you want to drop ship your order. You can also include the return address you want on your package in the notes field as well. This way we use your return address to make it look like you shipped the package. Also where it shows the shipping address below, make sure the shipping address is where you want to ship the package to. Here is a screen shot of what the screen will look like:



    If for some reason you miss any of this, just send us an email telling us the corrections to your order.

    [CLOSE THIS]

Bottle Opener

The strong metal back of this button is perfect for opening beer and soda bottles. There are also holes on the back which allow you to attach this bottle opener to your keychain(keyring not included). Promote a product, band, event, idea, or yourself!

Available in the following size

The pictures above are not to scale. We recommend using a standard unit of measurement like a ruler to get the best idea of the actual size.

Size Comparisons

SizeCommon Household Object
2.25 inchsoda can top

Product Specifications

  • The entire button is made of 4 pieces (Rigid Metal Bottle Opener Back, Metal Shell, Paper Graphic, Clear Plastic Cover)
  • The metal components are made of tin-plated steel
  • We print using high quality Epson Photo Inkjet Printers (Digital CMYK).
  • The paper we use is a special ordered thin custom bright white paper with a matte finish specifically designed for superior color quality and brightness for inkjet printing.
  • All products are made in the USA
  • Please note: Our buttons are not waterproof. The metal will rust when exposed to moisture over time. The ink on the paper can also fade after being exposed to lots of sunlight over time.

    • Clip Back Buttons

    Our Clip Back Buttons are a perfect alternative to our pin back buttons. Less dangerous than pins, and they won't poke holes. Great for schools, hospitals and businesses. Get your message across by clipping these buttons to your shirt, hat, lanyard, or even a necklace!

    Available in the following sizes

    The pictures above are not to scale. We recommend using a standard unit of measurement like a ruler to get the best idea of the actual size.

  • The metal components are made of tin-plated steel
  • We print using high quality Epson Photo Inkjet Printers (Digital CMYK).
  • The paper we use is a special ordered thin custom bright white paper with a matte finish specifically designed for superior color quality and brightness for inkjet printing.
  • All products are made in the USA
  • Please note: Our buttons are not waterproof. The metal will rust when exposed to moisture over time. The ink on the paper can also fade after being exposed to lots of sunlight over time.

    • Clothing/Shirt Magnet Buttons

    Our Clothing Magnet Buttons are a perfect alternative to our pin back buttons. The button has a flat back and the strong magnet separates from the button. Your clothing goes between the button and the magnet. They won't poke holes in clothes like buttons with pins. Great for hospitals and businesses.

    Available in the following sizes

    The pictures above are not to scale. We recommend using a standard unit of measurement like a ruler to get the best idea of the actual size.

    Size Comparisons

    SizeCommon Household Object
    1.5 inchgallon milk jug or dixie cup bottom
    2.25 inchsoda can top
    3 inchcampbells chunky soup can top

    Product Specifications

  • Warning: This product contains strong magnets which can be dangerous to children, people with pacemakers, electronics, and magnetic media. Full product warning can be found here.
  • The entire button is made of 5 pieces (Round Neodymium Magnet, Metal Back, Metal Shell, Paper Graphic, Clear Plastic Cover)
  • The magnet is strong enough to hold the button to a thick sweater or jacket
  • The metal components are made of tin-plated steel
  • We print using high quality Epson Photo Inkjet Printers (Digital CMYK).
  • The paper we use is a special ordered thin custom bright white paper with a matte finish specifically designed for superior color quality and brightness for inkjet printing.
  • All products are made in the USA
  • Please note: Our buttons are not waterproof. The metal will rust when exposed to moisture over time. The ink on the paper can also fade after being exposed to lots of sunlight over time.

    • Buttons with nothing on back

    These buttons have no pins on the back. With a hot glue gun, the options are endless for what you can attach to the back. You can find all sorts of items at your local craft store like glitter, felt, adhesive hooks, and pins you could attach to the back of these buttons. Great for people who want to be a little more crafty or creative with their button project.

    Available in the following sizes

    The pictures above are not to scale. We recommend using a standard unit of measurement like a ruler to get the best idea of the actual size.

    • Custom Button Packaging - Display Bag Option


    • We offer custom packaging options available upon request.
    • These professional display bags add a nice touch to any merchandise display.
    • Your customers or fans will definitely appreciate the extra level of detail this packaging provides for your buttons.
    • If you are interested in getting cards like these made feel free to email us at order@wackybuttons.com or start a live chat here.

    Level of Customization Available

    • Most of our products we sell can be packaged using this option. Our products that can be packaged this way include standard pin back buttons, refrigerator magnets, pocket mirrors, bottle openers, or clips.
    • Card size: 4x6 or 5x7 inches (folded in half horizontally or vertically to seal the top of the bag)
    • full color printed
    • FREE graphic design (no charge for artwork setup)
    • A digital proof (preview) of the product is emailed to you for FREE before you decide to pay for anything
    • hangar hole punch at the top
    • Square Corners only
    • bag size is flexible so you can hold enough buttons to the card display
    • We can mix and match button sizes in one bag
    • number of buttons that can be put in a bag:
      • up to (100) 1 inch buttons can be put in one bag
      • up to (50) 1.5 inch buttons can be put in one bag
      • up to (10) 2.25 inch buttons can be put in one bag
      • only (1) 3 inch button can be put in one bag
    • Turnaround time is 1 week (orders of 5000 cards or more may take longer)
    • Minimum quantity is 25 cards with prices starting at $1.99 per card + price of buttons and shipping
    • For a quantity of 100 cards average price is about $0.99 per card + price of buttons and shipping
    • the more cards you buy, the bigger the bulk discount will be
    • prices are subject to the level of customization and price quotations are provided by email

    • If you are interested in getting cards like these made feel free to email us at order@wackybuttons.com or start a live chat here.

    Level of Customization Available

    • only standard pin back buttons can be pinned to the card
    • Card size: 4x6 or 5x7 inches
    • full color printed
    • FREE graphic design (no charge for artwork setup)
    • A digital proof (preview) of the product is emailed to you for FREE before you decide to pay for anything
    • hangar hole punch at the top
    • Rounded or Square Corners
    • We can mix and match button sizes on one card
    • We can place the buttons on the cards in odd positions (they do not have to be in neat rows and columns)
    • number of buttons that can be pinned to a display card:
      • up to (6) 1 inch buttons can be placed on a card
      • up to (6) 1.5 inch buttons can be placed on a card
      • up to (4) 2.25 inch buttons can be placed on a card
      • only (1) 3 inch button can be placed on a card
    • Turnaround time is 1 week (orders of 5000 cards or more may take longer)
    • Minimum quantity is 25 cards with prices starting at $1.99 per card + price of buttons and shipping
    • For a quantity of 100 cards average price is about $1.39 per card + price of buttons and shipping
    • the more cards you buy, the bigger the bulk discount will be
    • prices are subject to the level of customization and price quotations are provided by email
